title: A model with Soulless:
text:
- y Cannot harvest Souls in the general way other Heroes harvest Souls.

- y Cannot contest Shrines.

- y Cannot Assist friendly non-Soulless models, or Hinder enemy nonSoulless models, that attempt a Soul Harvest .

- y Cannot have Souls Bound to it under any circumstances.

Death: When a Soulless model is killed by an enemy (noncursed ) Hero, the enemy Hero's Effigy gains a Banked Soul.
